sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Tab, Tabs, TabList, TabPanel } from "react-tabs"; import Hero from "../../components/hero/HeroLight"; import Index from "../../components/about/index"; import Address from "../../components/Address"; import Portfolio from "../../components/portfolio/PortfolioLight"; import Blog from "../../components/blog/BlogLight"; import Contact from "../../components/Contact"; import Social from "../../components/Social"; import AnimatedCursor from "react-animated-cursor"; import { useContext } from "react"; import { Context } from "../../components/Wrapper"; import { FormattedMessage } from 'react-intl' const menuItem = [ { icon: "fa-home", menuName: "Introduction" }, { icon: "fa-user", menuName: "CV" }, { icon: "fa-briefcase", menuName: "Portfolio" }, { icon: "fa-envelope-open", menuName: "Contact" }, { icon: "fa-comments", menuName: "Blog" }, ]; const HomeLight = () => { const context = useContext(Context); document.body.classList.add("light"); return (

{/* End Menu Content */}
{/* Hero Content Starts */}
{/* Hero Content Ends */} {/* About Content Starts */}

{/* End title */}
{/* About Content Ends */} {/* Portfolio Content Starts */}

{/* End title */}
{/* End grid gallery */} {/* Portfolio Content Ends */} {/* Blog Content Starts */}

my blog

posts
{/* Articles Starts */}
{/* Articles Ends */}
{/* Blog Content Ends */} {/* Contact Content Starts */}

contact
{/* Left Side Starts */}

{/* End Address */} {/* End Social */}
{/* Left Side Ends */} {/* Contact Form Starts */}
{/* Contact Form Ends */}
{/* End .container */} {/* Contact Content Ends */}
); }; export default HomeLight;
